about.title: About me
about.content: Italian, wine maker, frisbee player, <1>perfectonist</1>, <3>nerd</3>...<5/>I've studied medicine for my father,<7/>I'm learning to code for myself.<9/>I love to travel, make photos and cooking.<11/>I have <13>the best wife and the cutiest dog in the world.</13><14/><15>Multipotentialite</15>.
about.additionalContent1: I read 50+ books and 500+ comics every year.<1/>I'm passionate about sci-fi and fantasy.<3/>The only things I keep tidy are my pc, my code and my drill-bits.<5/>Before I fall asleep I use to dive in physics, astrophysics and math.<7/>I love the sound of rain but I live in the only desert of Europe.<9/>My religion says I have to eat pizza once a week.
about.additionalContent2: When I was a child (a lot of time ago...)<1/>my answer to the question:<3/>"What do you want to do when you grow up?"<5/>always was: <7/>"I would like to solve math problems!"<9/>I think that programming is the closest thing to my childhood dream.<11/>
